item.title: Regaining Control: British Travel to the EU Post-Brexit
item.description: Professor Steve Peers, University of Essex* *linked to research on the upcoming 5th edition of EU Justice and Home Affairs Law Photo credit: John Fielding, via Wikimedia Commons It’s self-evident that the UK leaving the EU has changed travel and residency rules for British citizens within the EU. This change mirrors the altered regulations for EU citizens traveling to and residing in the UK, a specific demand from the Leave campaign.
